chrome.management

Top-Level Variables
management: ChromeManagement
Classes
ChromeManagement
ExtensionInfo
IconInfo

The chrome.management API provides ways to manage the list of extensions/apps that are installed and running. It is particularly useful for extensions that override(override.html) the built-in New Tab page.

Top-Level Variables

static final ChromeManagement management

Accessor for the chrome.management namespace.

Class ChromeManagement

Fields
onDisabled: Stream
onEnabled: Stream
onInstalled: Stream
onUninstalled: Stream
Getters and Setters
onDisabled: Stream<dynamic>
onEnabled: Stream<dynamic>
onInstalled: Stream<dynamic>
onUninstalled: Stream<dynamic>

Fields

final Stream onDisabled
final Stream onEnabled
final Stream onInstalled
final Stream onUninstalled

Getters and Setters

Stream<dynamic> get onDisabled

Fired when an app or extension has been disabled.

Stream<dynamic> get onEnabled

Fired when an app or extension has been enabled.

Stream<dynamic> get onInstalled

Fired when an app or extension has been installed.

Stream<dynamic> get onUninstalled

Fired when an app or extension has been uninstalled.

Methods

Future<dynamic> get(String id)

Returns information about the installed extension, app, or theme that has the given ID.

id The ID from an item of ExtensionInfo.

Future<List<dynamic>> getAll()

Returns a list of information about installed extensions and apps.

Future<List<String>> getPermissionWarningsById(String id)

Returns a list of permission warnings(permission_warnings.html) for the given extension id.

id The ID of an already installed extension.

Future<List<String>> getPermissionWarningsByManifest(String manifestStr)

Returns a list of permission warnings(permission_warnings.html) for the given extension manifest string. Note: This function can be used without requesting the 'management' permission in the manifest.

manifestStr Extension manifest JSON string.

Future<dynamic> launchApp(String id)

Launches an application.

id The extension id of the application.

Future<dynamic> setEnabled(String id, bool enabled)

Enables or disables an app or extension.

id This should be the id from an item of ExtensionInfo.

enabled Whether this item should be enabled or disabled.

Future<dynamic> uninstall(String id, Map<dynamic, dynamic> options)

Uninstalls a currently installed app or extension.

id This should be the id from an item of ExtensionInfo.

Future<dynamic> uninstallSelf(Map<dynamic, dynamic> options)

Uninstalls the calling extension. Note: This function can be used without requesting the 'management' permission in the manifest.

Class ExtensionInfo extends ChromeObject

Constructors
ExtensionInfo(JsObject proxy)

Information about an installed extension, app, or theme.

Constructors

ExtensionInfo(JsObject proxy)

Class IconInfo extends ChromeObject

Constructors
IconInfo(JsObject proxy)

Information about an icon belonging to an extension, app, or theme.
